hints: This version introduced the ability to copy and paste text
It added support for MMS messages
Released in 2009
This version introduced the ability to create folders on the home screen
It added support for FaceTime video calls
Released in 2010
This version introduced iCloud integration
It added the Notification Center and iMessage
Released in 2011
This version replaced Google Maps with Apple Maps
It introduced the Passbook app (later renamed to Wallet)
Released in 2012
This version introduced AirDrop for iOS devices
It featured a major redesign with a flatter interface
Released in 2013
This version introduced the Health app
It added support for Touch ID in third-party apps
Released in 2014
This version introduced the News app
It added support for 3D Touch on compatible devices
Released in 2015
This version allowed users to remove built-in apps
It introduced the Home app for HomeKit devices
Released in 2016
This version introduced ARKit for augmented reality experiences
It added a redesigned Control Center
Released in 2017
This version introduced Screen Time to monitor device usage
It added support for grouped notifications
Released in 2018
This version allowed you to change the text size in Safari
It introduced Dark Mode system-wide
Released in 2019
This version introduced App Library for organizing apps
It added support for home screen widgets
Released in 2020
This version introduced Focus modes
It added Live Text for recognizing text in images
Released in 2021
This version introduced the ability to edit and unsend messages
It added a redesigned Lock Screen with widgets
Released in 2022
This version introduced the Journal app
It added interactive widgets and StandBy mode
Released in 2023
